# make_attack

make_attack(_attack_name, (value_name, value)... ) Source (opens new window)

Configure an attack from a series of keys and values.

// Without Assistant
set_attack_value(AT_BAIR, AG_CATEGORY, 1)
set_attack_value(AT_BAIR, AG_SPRITE, sprite_get("bair"))

// With Assistant
make_attack(AT_BAIR,
    AG_CATEGORY, 1,
    AG_SPRITE, sprite_get("bair")
)


Parameters:

  • _attack_name: The attack index (opens new window) to be configured.
  • Any number of pairs of:
    • value_name: An attack grid index (opens new window) to set.
    • value: The value to set to the paired attack grid index.

See Also

  • make_hitbox: Configure a hitbox.
  • make_window: Configure a window.
Propose changes in github (opens new window)
